description: Create a cutting-edge, professional website for IEEE Computer Society with stunning Three.js animations, React components, and an engaging user experience that showcases the organization's mission and leadership.

hero_section.description: A large glowing orange orb that morphs and pulses with particle effects floating around it. The orb should react to mouse movement with subtle distortions. Use noise functions for organic movement.
features: Pulsating glow effect synced with a subtle 'heartbeat' animation
Floating motion using React Three Drei's Float component

background_effects.wave_grid: Create a subtle wave effect on a grid plane in the background using simplex noise
background_effects.floating_elements: Small geometric shapes (cubes, tetrahedrons, octahedrons) floating with different speeds
background_effects.particle_connections: Particles that connect with glowing lines when close to each other
background_effects.gradient_fog: Three.js fog with orange gradient for depth

section_transitions.scroll_triggered: Use GSAP ScrollTrigger for smooth section reveals
section_transitions.parallax_layers: Multiple layers moving at different speeds
section_transitions.fade_in_elements: Stagger animations for text and images

interactive_elements.hover_effects: 3D tilt on cards, glowing borders, scale animations

navigation.style: Fixed top navigation with glassmorphism effect
navigation.logo: IEEE Computer Society logo with glow effect on hover
navigation.mobile_menu: Fullscreen overlay with staggered link animations

hero.title: IEEE Computer Society
hero.subtitle: Empowering the People Who Drive Technology
hero.description: Join over 375,000 computing professionals worldwide in advancing technology for the benefit of humanity
hero.background: The morphing 3D sphere with particle system

about.title: About IEEE Computer Society

content.mission: To be the leading provider of technical information, community services, and personalized services to the world's computing professionals.
content.vision: Be essential to the global technical community and computer professionals everywhere and be universally recognized for the contributions of technical professionals in developing and applying technology to improve global conditions.
key_points: World's largest organization of computing professionals

about.animation: Animated counter numbers, floating icon grid showcasing different computing fields

membership.title: Join IEEE Computer Society

benefits.title: Professional Development
benefits.description: Access to cutting-edge research, conferences, and educational resources

benefits.title: Career Resources
benefits.description: Job board, career center, and professional certifications

benefits.title: Publications Access
benefits.description: Computer magazine, ComputingEdge, and digital library

membership.cta: Animated join button with particle explosion on click

card_animation.hover: 3D tilt with glow effect and subtle float
card_animation.click: Flip to show bio or additional info

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.animation: Floating contact form with glassmorphism, input fields glow on focus
contact.background: Animated particle field that responds to form interactions

page_transitions.loading: IEEE CS logo animation with particle assembly

easter_eggs.konami_code: Trigger a special animation showcasing IEEE CS achievements
easter_eggs.logo_interaction: Click logo 5 times for particle explosion

performance_optimizations: Implement LOD (Level of Detail) for 3D objects
Use web workers for complex calculations
Optimize particle count based on device performance

accessibility.reduced_motion: Provide static alternatives for users who prefer reduced motion
accessibility.screen_readers: Proper ARIA labels and semantic HTML
accessibility.keyboard_navigation: Full keyboard support for all interactive elements

additional_features: Dark mode toggle with smooth transition
Newsletter signup with particle celebration on success
